eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Juneau, AK; at 12:50 PM ON JAN 9, 2026 Effective until 02:50 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: CBJ  Avalanche Advisory. High avalanche risk in all known slide paths. Residents within these areas should evacuate ahead of increasing rainfall. Emergency shelter available at Centennial Hall at 12PM. Limit travel in avalanche-exposed areas. Monitor official CBJ updates at bit.ly/CBJavalanche.Visit bit.ly/CBJavalanche. Residents are advised to evacuation known slide path areas. Emergency shelter available at Centennial Hall. Limit travel in avalanche-exposed areas. Monitor official CBJ updates at bit.ly/CBJavalanche.
